room_title: Escape room "Castle Adventure" by Escape Room Family in Cincinnati
room_description: This medieval adventure consists of two rooms: Attack Their Castle and Defend Your Castle. Players will spend half an hour in the first room exploring the puzzles and working together to gain the highest score. After a short break, they will experience the other Castle room, continuing the story and making memories. If you have ever wanted to have a medieval adventure, hereâ€™s your chance.
